'''Benjamin Milder''' was a game designer who worked on the [[Bilbo Slider Puzzle]]<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/slider.html Bilbo Slider Puzzle] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 2 April 2011)</ref><ref name="Baidu">[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu, 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 2 April 2011)</ref> and the [[Tolkien WordSearch]].<ref name="Baidu"/><ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/wordsearch.html Tolkien WordSearch] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 3 April 2011)</ref>
